answers.answer: Feeling sad as I'm not feeling very good
I just ate a huge chick fila salad and cookie so im nice and tired bitimg at work :( 30 weeks :)
Feeling very sick and tired 24/7 its gettin me down and affecting everything i do.

I am feeling huge.  Can't breathe.  Ribs are sore.  Diarrhea all day every day for the past 2 weeks.  Acid reflux,  even if i don't eat anything. 39+2 , this boy needs to come sooner rather then later,  I'm exhausted!
Feeling bad:/ gestational diabetes spikes make me feel like a bad momma:(

I'm sorry all you mama's having a rough day. Being pregnant is hard. I'm doing well today, finally over my morning sickness. Showered for the first time in a few days, did my hair for the first time in (sadly) about three months. Ready to shop for my twins nursery. Hopefully everyone's day will brighten up a bit!

Awe I feel you mommies out there!!! Just think when your buddle of joy arrives all that morning sickness trading your pants for maternity jeans. All the worries we momma has to endure the entire 9 months was better worth it!!!
Exhausted.  I am constipated so bad it hurts to even sit down. My 3 year old is driving me up a wall and lucky me my morning sickness came back with a vengeance this week. Uggg
Feeling fine-just feeling very FAT.  I'm supposed to dress up for an event tonight and nothing fits.  :( 30 wks

I am feeling pretty good,  thanks. Had some contractions last night but they were not close nor painful enough. I just turned 37 weeks today and I can't wait to meet my baby!  We kept the gender a surprise so I am very excited to find out if it's a girl or a boy!

question: Having a good day or bad day??? Or feeling fat at the moment stage or wanna sleep kinda of day.Sunday I will will be 26 wks along!!! My days are seldom blah or tired or give me that f*** candy!!!!
title: so how's all you preggo doing today??
